title: Final Audit Report of the Republican Party of Arkansas
html:
News Releases, Media Advisories

July 11, 2003

Advisory to Editors, Correspondents, Broadcasters:
FINAL AUDIT REPORT ON THE REPUBLICAN PARTY OF ARKANSAS
The Federal Election Commission has made available the final audit report on the Republican Party of Arkansas. This audit covers the period of January 1, 1999 through December 31, 2000.

Contact: FEC Press Office (202) 694-1220, 999 E Street, NW
